name: Tiny Galaxies
description:
[REQUIRES two players] #BTPGameJam

A Turn-based tactics game for two players, about galactic conquests, on a tiny scale. 

Made during the BlackThronProd February 2019 game Jam.  The theme was Tiny Planets.  To fit the theme each planet can only support two ships and only provides one resource per turn.  This forces each player to think carefully about their moves.  A future update is planned to add an AI opponent.

Free Assets used (not created during the Jam):

  • Ambient_Hum_Pitched - you tube audio library
  • Forboding_Resonance - you tube audio library
  • ZCOOLQingKeHuangYou-Regular SDF - google fonts
